items.name: Brockley 6 Pack
items.desc:
Brockley Brewery six pack of bottles now available for only £12.00!
Choose your selection from a wide variety of brews; Pale Ale, Citrus IPA, Lager, Red Ale, Porter, Session IPA and our Wheat Beer. Please add your choice to the NOTES box at checkout.
This offer is available for local delivery to South East London postcodes and Collection Only. Please do not order this for UK wide delivery.
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
Free beer delivery to residents of SE4, SE12 + SE13!
£2 delivery for all other SE London postcodes!
Local Delivery will be made by bike between 4 and 8pm!
Not available for UK mainland standard delivery.
COLLECTION OPTION:
Save on the delivery fee by collecting from our Hither Green Site. You may collect your beer on the same-day if you order by 2pm. Collections take place from 2.30 - 4.30pm, 7 days a week. If you order after 2pm your beer will be ready for collection the next day.
Please make sure you select 'Collection: Hither Green Taproom' if you wish to collect.

items.name: Brockley Mixed 12 Pack
items.desc:
We now have cases of 12 330ml bottles available for deilvery! Get your beer-lover the perfect present and choose from our epic selection of Mixed or One Beer Only boxes.
If you choose our Bespoke option, please tell us what mix of bottles you would like for your case in the 'ADD NOTE' section, in the checkout before you complete your purchase.
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
Free beer delivery to residents of SE4, SE12 + SE13!
£2 delivery for all other SE London postcodes!
Local Delivery will be made by bike between 4 and 8pm!
£5 delivery for the rest of the UK!

items.name: Brockley Mixed 24 Pack
items.desc:
We now have cases of 24 330ml bottles available for delivery. Get your beer-lover the perfect present and choose from our epic selection of Mixed or One Beer Only boxes.
If you choose our Bespoke option, please tell us what mix of bottles you would like for your case in the 'ADD NOTE' section, in the checkout before you complete your purchase.
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
Free beer delivery to residents of SE4, SE12 + SE13!
£2 delivery for everyone else in Lewisham and all of Southwark!
Local Delivery will be made by bike between 4 and 8pm!
£5 delivery for the rest of the UK!

items.name: Wheat Beer 4 Pack
items.desc:
We're proud to announce that we've brewed up a fresh new batch of our tremendous Wheat Beer into cans! It's a zesty, refreshing wheat beer; 4.7% ABV, hazy, full bodied and lightly hopped with Perle hops.
We've packed the brew with fresh lemon zest and fermented it using Belgian yeast, giving the beer its distinctive, but gentle, banana aroma, all set against a tangy citrus backdrop.
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
Free beer delivery to residents of SE4, SE12 + SE13!
£2 delivery for all other SE London postcodes!
Local Delivery will be made by bike between 4 and 8pm!
£5 delivery for the rest of the UK!
